name: Invoice Created → Email Notification
description: When an invoice is created in Odoo, automatically send email notification to customer

parameters.title: New Invoice Created
parameters.message: Invoice {{event.data.invoice_number}} for ${{event.data.amount}} has been created for customer {{event.data.customer_id}}

parameters.subject: Invoice {{event.data.invoice_number}} - ${{event.data.amount}}
parameters.body:
Dear Customer,

Your invoice {{event.data.invoice_number}} for ${{event.data.amount}} has been created.

Please review and process payment at your earliest convenience.

Thank you for your business!

Best regards,
AI Employee
